name: Tabib
description:
This is my entry for Stareye Atlas Game Jam.

 The theme is "We rise by lifting others".

 I manifested the theme by giving player ability to heal others to help them survive and ability to level up them to boost their power. These actions give player XP to level up if XP is enough.

Controls:

NumPad keys = move Tabib

Z = Level Up other

X = Heal other

C = Heal self

Enter = Pause or confirm

F8 = Take screenshot
